extracted_entities.name: Assistant Professors in Software Engineering and AI

requirements.degree: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical or Computer Engineering (with a research focus in Software), or equivalent
requirements.publications: Track record in top international conference venues (e.g., ICSE, FSE, ASE, ICSME, ESEM) or journals (e.g., TOSEM, TSE, EMSE, JSS)
requirements.teaching_commitment: Ability to teach undergraduate (1st to 4th year) and graduate courses
requirements.experience: Prior teaching and student supervision experience preferred
requirements.professionalism: Required professionalism for a collegial environment

details.research_focus: Engagement with Generative AI impacts on Software Engineering
